entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming partly cloudy this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
